question: Are the Laleli Mosque and Esma Sultan Mansion located in the same neighborhood?
Only return yes or no. Do not add explanations.
provenance: She was the adoptive mother of Bezmiâlem Sultan and Rahime Perestu Sultan.The Laleli Mosque (Turkish: "Laleli Camii, or Tulip Mosque" ) is an 18th-century Ottoman imperial mosque located in Laleli, Fatih, Istanbul, Turkey.Gevheri Kadın (8 July 1856 – 6 September 1884) was the fifth wife of 32nd Ottoman Sultan Abdülaziz.

It sits next to the Hagia Sophia, another popular tourist site.Esma Sultan (21 March 1873 – 7 May 1899) was an Ottoman princess, the daughter of Sultan Abdülaziz and his wife Gevheri Kadın, herself the daughter of Salih Bey Svatnba.
